name: Rexal Tube
overview:
Established in the year 1995, we, “Rexal Tubes”, are counted among the prominent business entities engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a comprehensive assortment of Industrial Pipes, Sheets, Bars, Tubes, Flanges, Valves & Fasteners.

Product Portfolio: Stainless Steel Butt Weld Fittings Nickel Alloy Butt Weld Fittings Carbon Steel Butt Weld Fittings Copper Alloy Butt Weld Fittings Stainless Steel Sheets Nickel Alloy Sheets Alloy Steel Plates Duplex Steel Sheets

Quality Assurance: Quality is the main pillar supporting the growth of our organization in the highly competitive market. To maintain this, we manufacture the complete range of products strictly in compliance with the global quality standards by employing superior-grade raw material, which is sourced from the reputed vendors of the market.

Application Area: Automobiles Farm equipment Railway & Tramway Defense Aerospace Piping related industry Oil exploration

Warehouse and Packaging Facility: We own a spacious warehousing unit that is capable of storing ferrous and non-ferrous industrial raw material and pipes & fittings in an appropriate manner. Our warehouse is designed in such way that keeps the product systematically in different sessions to protect it from water, moisture and other harmful elements. Further, we have inventory personnel who maintain a record of incoming and outgoing material.

Our Products: Carbon Steel Seamless Pipes-1 Steel Plates and Sheets Round and Square Bars Steel Fasteners Steel Flanges Control Valves Stainless Steel Products Duplex Steel Products Inconel Products Steel product Monel Products Hastelloy Products
